snippet.title: The Expanse: A Telltale Series Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience the exciting universe of The Expanse like never before in Telltale’s latest adventure, The Expanse: A Telltale Series. Get a small taste of the story to come in this latest trailer before Episode 1 launches July 27th 2023!

Pre-order on PlayStation, Xbox and Epic Game Store NOW 

Epic Game Store
Standard Edition: https://store.epicgames.com/p/the-expanse-a-telltale-series?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=StoryTrailer&sub_id=telltale 
Deluxe Edition: https://store.epicgames.com/p/the-expanse-a-telltale-series--deluxe-edition?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=StoryTrailer&sub_id=telltale

Xbox
Deluxe Edition: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9mwg1nj92q94?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=StoryTrailer
Standard Edition: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9nfxwr3nbq9s?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=StoryTrailer

PlayStation:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10004308/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=StoryTrailer

Follow Cara Gee, who reprises her role as Camina Drummer, and explore the dangerous and uncharted edges of The Belt aboard The Artemis. From scavenging wrecked ships in a zero-g environment, to surviving a mutiny, to combating fearsome pirates, you make the difficult choices and reveal Camina Drummer’s resolve in this latest Telltale adventure.

After the initial episode launches on July 27th, the remaining four episodes drop every two weeks. Get ready to enter #TheExpanse.


SUBSCRIBE ► http://bit.ly/TelltaleSubscribe

The Expanse: A Telltale Series

Learn more ► https://www.telltale.com/the-expanse/
